content.en: Plasma control optimization: Scientists are working on optimizing the performance of plasma in fusion reactors like ASDEX Upgrade and ITER. They are using control algorithms to adapt to different discharge scenarios and control the position, shape, rotation, and energy of the plasma. These algorithms are being developed and tested on various tokamaks, including DIII-D and TCV, to improve plasma control and achieve better fusion reactions.
content.da: Optimering af plasmastyring: Forskere arbejder på at optimere ydeevnen af plasma i fusionsreaktorer som ASDEX Upgrade og ITER. De bruger styringsalgoritmer til at tilpasse sig forskellige udladningsscenarier og kontrollere plasmaets position, form, rotation og energi. Disse algoritmer bliver udviklet og testet på forskellige tokamakker, herunder DIII-D og TCV, for at forbedre plasmastyringen og opnå bedre fusionsreaktioner.
